title: Expense-Manager-BluJ-Business-5.0.1-FULL.apk
description:
Expense Manager by BluJ Business is an application that was created for business men and women to ease the tracking of business related items such as expenses, mileage, time, and payments for jobs or trips. It has been tailored to allow easy entry of these items throughout job or trip. Once the trip or job is complete, Expense Manager by BluJ Business allows the data to be viewed and exported in a variety of ways both as PDF reports and CSV exports. These reports and exports can then be viewed on the device or emailed to whoever needs them. The CSV export is also great for importing applications such as Quicken and Quickbooks.

Features:
* Managing different clients with features for bill rates, billing increments, etc.
* Creation of jobs and association to clients.
* Dynamic job states: Active, Billed, Overdue, and Paid.
* Tracking of expenses, mileage, time, and payments within the different jobs.
* Fully functional application without network connections.
* Multinational currency support.
* Exchange Rate data importing from the internet.
* Expense tracking with payment method, tags, merchants, notes, and pictures.
* Receipt capture makes use of camera.
* Mileage tracking in both imperial or metric units.
* Time tracking.
* Payment management.
* Extensive Reporting capabilities.
* Collected data is able to be exported in a CSV format.
* Reports and exported data are able to be emailed.
* Ability to view reports from the Android device.
* Manage reimbursement rates for personal vehicle use.
* Tag Management that allows for creation and deletion of tags and tag groups.
* Extensive users guide built into the application, not requiring web access.
* Backup/Restore to/from SD card and the Cloud.
